Module Simulator
Package kin.env.obstacles

Class PolyhedricObstacle

java.lang.Object
kin.env.obstacles.Obstacle
kin.env.obstacles.PolyhedricObstacle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Conveyor, Cuboid, Slice, Slope, Step, Wedge
public abstract class PolyhedricObstacle
extends Obstacle

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom)
    Creates an obstacle without any polyhedron configurtion.
    PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom, double height)
    Creates an obstacle with single height for Step.
    PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom, double lowerHeight, double upperHeight)
    Creates an obstacle with two heights for Slice.
    PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom, double upperHeight1, double upperHeight2, double lowerHeight1, double lowerHeight2, boolean inclineX)
    Creates an obstacle with two pair of heights for Slope, Wedge.

  • Constructor Details

    • PolyhedricObstacle

      public PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom)
      Creates an obstacle without any polyhedron configurtion. The developer must call updatePolyhedron(Polyhedron) prio to any queries to this object.
      Parameters:
      geom - 2D ground projection geometry

    • PolyhedricObstacle

      public PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom, double height)
      Creates an obstacle with single height for Step.
      Parameters:
      geom - 2D ground projection geometry
      height - height over bottom

    • PolyhedricObstacle

      public PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom, double lowerHeight, double upperHeight)
      Creates an obstacle with two heights for Slice.
      Parameters:
      geom - 2D ground projection geometry
      lowerHeight - lower height over bottom
      upperHeight - upper height over bottom

    • PolyhedricObstacle

      public PolyhedricObstacle​(Geom2D geom, double upperHeight1, double upperHeight2, double lowerHeight1, double lowerHeight2, boolean inclineX)
      Creates an obstacle with two pair of heights for Slope, Wedge.
      Parameters:
      geom - 2D ground projection geometry
      upperHeight1 - upper height over bottom (at min x or min y)
      upperHeight2 - upper height over bottom (at max x or max y)
      lowerHeight1 - lower height over bottom (at min x or min y)
      lowerHeight2 - lower height over bottom (at max x or max y)
      inclineX - true height difference goes over x

  • Method Details

    • updatePolyhedron

      public void updatePolyhedron​(Polyhedron ph)
      Assign a (new) polyhedron.
      Parameters:
      ph - polyhedron

    • getPolyhedron

      public Polyhedron getPolyhedron()
      Get the geometric representation as Polyhedron of this obstacle.
      Returns:
      polyhedron

    • getMBR

      public double[] getMBR()
      Description copied from class: Obstacle
      Get the object's minimal bounding box.
      Specified by:
      getMBR in class Obstacle
      Returns:
      array of 6 with minX,maxX,minY,maxY,minZ,maxZ

    • moveOutObstacle

      public java.util.ArrayList<double[][]> moveOutObstacle​(PolyhedricObstacle obstacle)
      Description copied from class: Obstacle
      Compute, how to move the given obstacle (usually a Cuboid out of this ostacle.
      Specified by:
      moveOutObstacle in class Obstacle
      Parameters:
      obstacle - the other polyhedric obstacle to move out
      Returns:
      list of deepest points, each of it: [0] deepest point, [1] direction vector to move the point out, [2] null or additional velocity in per ArmBot.SIMULATION_TICK_DELTA. Entire result may be null for no intersection.
